pages.text: The AR/M4 platform is widely used and each rifle based on it shares similar characteristics. Note that they accept the same standard M4/AR Magazines, and are chambered in both 5.56 and .223
The AR-15 rifle is a semi-automatic rifle based on the AR/M4 platform.
The M16 rifle shares the same platform as the AR-15, but is fully automatic for military use.
